metadata.name: Security Software Discovery - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects usage of system utilities (only grep and egrep for now) to discover security software discovery

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/grep')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/egrep'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nessusd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('td-agent')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('packetbeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('filebeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('auditbeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osqueryd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cbagentd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('falcond'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of system utilities (only grep and egrep for now) to discover security software discovery
